name: Soldier Boyz
description:
Soldier Boyz is an arcade game developed by Hypnotix and MPCA Interactive. It came out on 30-04-1997. It was published by DreamCatcher Interactive.
Soldier Boyz is available on PC.
Brad Krevoy, Bradley Thomas and Steve Stabler produced the game. Louis Morneau and Louis Mourneau directed the game.
